metaDescription: Meet the team, our mission, and governance structure.
title: Team Documents
intro: Here you'll find information about our leadership, founding principles, and key governance documents.

sections.heading: Founding Vision
sections.content: Nouvo Ayiti 2075 was born from a need to restore dignity and hope through collective leadership.

sections.heading: Core Team
sections.content: Our leadership team is composed of visionaries, technologists, educators, and organizers from Haiti and the diaspora.

sections.heading: Legal Structure
sections.content: We are currently registered under Florida law and operating with full compliance.
